trigger: Water heater lacks temperature and pressure (T&P) relief valve
action_item: Install a T&P relief valve per code and program requirements before any weatherization work proceeds.
documentation: Photo of installed T&P valve; documentation in job file.
policy_text: All water heaters must have an operational T&P relief valve for safety compliance.

trigger: T&P discharge pipe missing or non-compliant
action_item: Install a code-compliant discharge pipe to the T&P relief valve. Ensure proper termination and no threading at the end.
documentation: Photo of pipe installation, inspection note in job file.
policy_text: T&P valves must be piped with a discharge line per code, terminating within 6 inches of the floor.

trigger: Water heater vent pipe disconnected, rusted, or improperly sloped
action_item: Repair or replace vent piping as needed. Confirm proper slope (minimum 1/4” per foot upward from draft hood) and secure all joints.
documentation: Photo of corrected vent, compliance sign-off in job file.
policy_text: Proper venting is required for safe operation of gas water heaters.

trigger: Water heater installed in prohibited location (e.g., sleeping room, bathroom, confined closet with no venting)
action_item: Defer weatherization until water heater is relocated or proper combustion air/venting is installed by a licensed professional.
documentation: Photo of location, code reference, and job file note.
policy_text: Water heaters must not be located in sleeping rooms or bathrooms unless properly enclosed/ventilated per code.

trigger: Visible corrosion or leaks at water heater
action_item: Assess for replacement. If leaking or unsafe, defer until unit is replaced and passes inspection.
policy_text: Leaking or corroded water heaters are a health & safety deferral.

trigger: Foam pipe insulation within 6 inches of vent or flue
action_item: Remove foam insulation and replace with fire-rated fiberglass wrap. Document correction before WX work proceeds.
documentation: Photo of corrected insulation, material spec in job file.
policy_text: Combustible pipe insulation must not be within 6 inches of a combustion vent or flue.
